instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3332: What is 820-3332? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3332</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A red light no audio even after jack replacment
threads.message:
Hi guys, I got this MBP 15 retina, red light on jack, I have replaced the part (seperate from boardr) and i still get the red light..what can cause it on MLB?

EDIT: I have replaced the <RESISTOR>R6895</RESISTOR> red light is gone and sound is back, both on speakers and headphones. (Port B detect SPDIF Delegate)
